title: Communicating Science to Informal Audiences
description: Graduate science students will develop fundamental communication and instructional skills through the understanding and application of learning theory, interpretive techniques, and pedagogical practices, including the development of an education/outreach plan to support a competitive research proposal. May be coscheduled with SIO 180. Renumbered from SIO 292. Students may not receive credit for SIO 292 and SIOB 292.  Prerequisites: graduate standing or consent of instructor.
